step2.ptxt: The power door lock control system has the following functions:

entry.ptxt: This function can lock or unlock all doors by operation of the door control switch.
This function, linked with the driver door key cylinder, can lock or unlock all the doors when a lock or unlock operation is effected.

item.ptxt: All the doors are locked when all the doors are closed and the vehicle reaches a speed of 25 km/h (15.5 mph) for the first time. This function is controlled by the theft warning ECU assembly.
This function can be disabled together with the speed-sensitive automatic door lock function according to user preference. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.
After all the doors are locked through the operation of the speed-sensitive automatic door lock function, turning the ignition switch off automatically unlocks all the doors.

This function can be disabled together with the ignition switch-linked automatic door unlock function, according to user preference. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.
